events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle on the morning of May 12th, requesting immediate claim processing.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident cluster based on keywords present in the initial report concerning the car collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to handle the case and contact the claimant within the day.
Acknowledgment of the filed claim was sent to the customer to confirm receipt and outline the forthcoming process and timelines.
The customer was asked to submit the police report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimates to support the investigation.
Customer successfully uploaded all requested documents including the accident report and detailed repair assessments.
Investigation team initiated review of submitted documents and began contacting witnesses to verify the vehicle collision details.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured driver was not at fault and the extent of the vehicle damage was verified.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the full cost of repairs and a rental vehicle during the timeframe of repairs.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt response and the proposed settlement, agreeing to the terms presented.
Claim approval was finalized based on the investigation results and customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Settlement payment was processed and transferred to the customer's account for vehicle repairs and rental coverage as agreed.
The claim was officially closed following payment confirmation and receipt of customer confirmation on repair completion.
All claim documentation and records were archived securely in compliance with company retention policies.
